text:
Staycation saat pandemi, bisa tetep ngerasa aman, soalnya The Alts cukup oke juga buat protokol kesehatannya. 
Pintu Masuk Kamar ada sticker "Cleaned and Sealed For Your Protection", good. 
Semua gelas di sterilin dan dikemas plastik. 
Dari zaman masih Grand Zuri sampe jadi The Alts, tetep bagus fasilitas dan makanan di sini. 
Alhamdulillah request high floor, dapat, dikasih di lantai 7. 
Dulu terakhir staycation disini, dapat afternoon tea di Gastro Pub nya di jam sore, sekarang nggak ada lagi ya. Tapi yang uniknya dapat complimentary shoe shine service sekarang. 
Amenities lengkap, ada sisirnya juga, sip. 
Btw, thank you untuk kakak di bagian pintu masuk (lupa cek namanya), sudah bantu kami ambil foto dengan ramah dan baik hati.

text: Saat check in hotel, saya dilayani dengan sangat baik oleh petugas dan diinformasikan oleh petugas resepsionis bahwa setiap sore jam 4 sampai jam 5.30 ada free snack di swimming pool. Wow, saya langsung terpukau karena tidak pernah mendapatkan hal seperti ini sebelumnya. Lalu saya naik ke swimming pool dan benar saja ada banyak snack disajikan dalam porsi mini tentu saja tetapi cukuplah untuk sekedar pendamping teh sore hari. Kamar hotelnya lumayan lega, tempat tidur besar dan tidak terlampau tinggi, sehingga menurut saya aman buat anak-anak turun naik tempat tidur. Yang paling membuat saya terkesan adalah pasta gigi yang disediakan di kamar mendi adalah pasta gigi bermerek dalam ukuran travel. Ini sangat baik dibandingkan pasta gigi ukuran mini yang biasa disediakan di hotel lain. Untuk sarapan, lumayan beragam dan restonya juga cukup besar untuk menampung tamu-tamu sehingga tidak perlu antri untuk mendapatkan meja kosong. Poin minusnya menurut saya adalah parkirannya terbatas sehingga saat saudara saya datang berkunjung dia harus parkir di luar hotel.

text:
The Alts memiliki gedung yang tidak terlalu luas, tapi memiliki 11 lantai. Lobby nya mewah, proses check in berjalan lancar. Restoran terlihat kecil, tapi ternyata cukup luas dan meja untuk tamu cukup banyak. Menu sarapan sangat bervariasi, dari menu tradisional hingga western. Kita bisa menemukan pempek, tekwan, celimpungan, lontong sayur sampai gado-gado di menu sarapan. Rasanya-pun juga lumayan.

Menginap di kamar deluxe cabana dengan balcon, awalnya kami pikir balcon-nya mengarah ke pemandangan kota, ternyata balcon masih dalam area indoor hotel. 
Tipe kamar ini termasuk smooking room, tapi tidak berbau rokok dan bersih banget kamarnya. 
Kasur king size, kamar mandi lengkap dengan hair dryer, saluran tv lengkap dan berfungsi dengan baik, balcon yang bersih lengkap dengan sofa dan mejanya. 

Yang keren dari hotel ini adalah kolam renangnya. Saya mencoba berenang malam hari sebelum tutup jam 8 malam. Pemandangan malamnya keren banget, kita bisa liat jembatan ampera dengan lampunya yang berubah-ubah, pemandangan kota yang cantik dengan angin yang berhembus. Kita juga bisa pesan makanan di pub sebelah kolam renang. Tentu-nya handuk berenang disediakan secara gratis.

Sayangnya suara musik dari pub lantai 10 terdengar nyaring hingga ke kamar, apalagi kalau balconnya dibuka, makin nyaring. Walaupun pintu balcon cukup kedap, tapi yah namanya juga malam minggu. Mungkin memang acara hotel.

Menurut saya cukup Memuaskan untuk tinggal di The Alts walaupun hanya 1 malam.

text:
Hotelnya bagus, staff nya ramah, event yg kami adakan disana pun alhamdullillah lancar, staff banquet sangat membantu. A great hospitality actually.. But... There was a disturbance that was very disturbing when I was resting after getting tired of the Bandung-Palembang-Palembang trip. Mba April sudah sangat baik mengusahakan kamar saya early check-in, dan saya langsung beristirahat saat itu. Saat masih lelap, saya akhirnya TERPAKSA harus bangun karena suara gaduh maintenance di kamar sebelah saya. Saya sampai harus mendatangi kamar tersebut dan menyampaikan kepada staff Engineering bahwa saya sedang tidur dan dia bilang dia akan menghentikan aktifitas. Namun NYATANYA dia tidak berhenti sehingga saya kembali TERPAKSA bangun dan dengan perasaan kesal saya datang ke meja FO dan menyampaikan kekecewaan saya kpd Mba Rindu.
Masukan saya : 
1. Jangan tempatkan kamar tamu disebelah kamar yg akan di maintenance jika akan membuat gaduh.
2. Jika harus tetap menempatkan tamu pada kamar sebelah yg di maintenance, setidaknya infokan kepada tamu tersebut, sehingga tamu bs memberitahu apakah ia akan terganggu / tidak.
3. Jika tamu sudah protes (seperti yg sy lakukan), harap staff Engineering benar2 menghentikan aktifitasnya saat itu juga. Please jangan menyangkal bahwa Anda tidak langsung berhenti ya.. karena Mba Rindu tidak akan sy semprot klo Anda benar2 berhenti gedag-gedug kamar sebelah.
Sisanya, kami happy kok stay di The Alts.
So thank you for your kind service, specially Mba Rindu, Mas yg bantu saya settled payment event 7Sky Global Media and Mba April yg udh support luar biasa utk kami. (except to the Engineering man! I forgot to asked his name!)
And oh! The chef!! Your Tom Yum and Mie Aceh are delicious.. i love it!!
title: It's a nice hotel! But...

text:
Sempat menginap di Grand Zuri utk 3 malam dalam rangka perjalanan kerja.
Hotel masih tampak bagus, proses check-in mudah dan cepat.
Kamar bersih, nyaman, dan luas..
Fasilitas hotel juga cukup lengkap, dengan adanya kolam renang, spa & massage, fitness facility, room service, laundry.

Kualitas breakfast jg bagus, pilihan cukup beragam mulai dari makanan khas Palembang, asia, hingga western.
Kadang terdapat mie corner (seperti mie ayam) rasanya enak, harus coba.. =)

Overall stay sangat baik dan memuaskan, rekomended utk keluarga dan para tamu yg memiliki keperluan bisnis di Palemban.. Lokasi juga tidak jauh dari restaurant dan tempat makan serta mini market & ATM.

text:
Kembali dinas ke Palembang sy memutuskan untuk menginap di Hotel Grand Zuri setelah beberapa hari sebelumnya sy mencoba beberapa hotel lain yg sekelas.
Hotelnya masih sangat bersih, fasiltas di kamar lengkap, namun saat menggunakan kamar mandi, saluran air di kamar (643) ternyata tidak lancar sehingga air cukup menggenang. da kamar satu lagi yg digunakan teman saya (627) agak byk nyamuknya.
Saat menggunakan lift menuju restoran utk sahur lampu di lift sempat padam dan membuat tidak nyaman.
Menu Sahur cukup byk pilihan namun rasanya sangat kurang, terutama utk omelat yg sdh dingin krn tdk di masak saat ada permintaan saja namun sdh di buat terlebih dahulu, utk roti tidak ada pilihan selai dan hanya ada satu saja selai yg agak keunguan warnanya sehingga saya ragu utk menggunakannya dan hanya menggunakan margarin saja.

text:
Saya menginap pada tanggal 31 Agustus selama 3 malam dan mengambil 2 kamar Superior berikut ulasan saya : 

1. Lokasi (rating ✴✴✴✴)
Plus : 
- banyak cafe dan tempat makan di sekitar hotel.
- untuk beli oleh2 khas palembang seperti pempek mudah karena depan hotel ada pempek candy dan di sebelah hotel ada pempek beringin.
- bukan daerah macet. 
Minus : 
- hati2 kalau berjalan di sekitar hotel, jangan main handphone sembarangan sambil jalan karena daerah situ terkenal jambretnya. 
- agak jauh mencari minimarket harus jalan dulu ke ujung sebelah kanan hotel ada alfamart. 

2. Fasilitas (rating ✴✴✴✴✴)
Plus : 
- free wifi di all area termasuk di setiap kamar. Koneksinya sangat bagus dan kencang. Enak untuk browsing dan menunjang sekali untuk yg kerja. 
- ada kolam renang yang terdiri dari kolam renang anak dan dewasa. 
- ada fitness center yang lumayan ramai. 
- ada restaurant yang kemarin ketika saya menginap lagi ada promo. 
- room service 24 hour. 
- ada tempat massage and spa di lantai 3. 
- ada kamar smoking dan non smoking. 
- tiap pagi ada newspapper yang di gantung di depan pintu.
Minus : 
- fasilitas swimming pool dan fitness center sepertinya terbuka untuk umum sehingga ketika sore saya mencoba fasilitas tersebut agak kurang nyaman karena teralu ramai oleh tamu luar hotel, apalagi swimming pool tidak teralu besar. 

3. Service (rating ✴✴✴✴)
Plus : 
- reception ketika c.in cukup ramah dan cukup membantu. Mereka berusaha memberikan kamar sesuai dengan request kita. Oh ya kalau keperluan dinas dan kita beli ke agen travel mereka mau memberikan surag keterangan menginap untuk kepentingan dinas. 
- ada welcome drink ketika kita c.in.
- hampir semua pegawai memberikan greetings kepada tamu termasuk security yg berjaga di pintu luar. Hospitality  selalu mereka terapkan dan menjadi penilaian plus karena itu salah satu dasar yg harus diterapkan dalam industri perhotelan.
- petugas house keeping cukup cepat dalam membersihkan kamar dan setiap harinya selalu memberikan amenities harian di kamar maupun kamar mandi walaupun belum digunakan. 
Minus : 
- petugas restoran ketika breakfast teralu sedikit sepertinya, karena piring atau gelas yg sudah digunakan telat mereka clear up. Meja yg sudah digunakan oleh tamu sebelumnya jarang atau telat di set up kembali peralatan makannya, sehingga kadang masih kotor meja untuk tamu berikutnya yang akan sarapan.

4. Bedroom (rating ✴✴✴✴)
Plus : 
- kasur cukup nyaman dan empuk dilengkapi 2 buah bantal besar dan 1 buah bantal kecil. 
- ada meja rias dan kursinya. 
- ada sofa kecil untuk santai dan meja untuk meletakan minuman dan asbak. 
- kaca jendela bisa dibuka sehingga untuk perokok asapnya dapat keluar kamar. 
- ada tv flat yg cukup besar di lengkapi dengan  tv kabel yang cukup lengkap channelnya. 
- ada kettel pemanas air untuk menyeduh kopi/teh. 
- ada lemari untuk menyimpan baju yg cukup panjang. Ada beberapa hanger yang di letakan di lemari. 
- ada deposit box juga yang di letakan di lemari. 
- kebersihan kamar cukup terjaga dengan baik, terlihat karpet di dalam kamar terlihat bersih. 
- luas kamar juga cukup besar untuk 2 orang dewasa. 
Minus : 
- ac suhunya tidak bisa diatur ke 30° karena dia mentok antara 15° sampai 20°, sehingga sinus saya kambuh karena kedinginan. Ini saya tidak tau apa rusak tombol acnya atau memang di set seperti itu tombolnya. 
- kamar kurang kedap suara sehingga suara kamar sebelah apalagi dari connecting door selalu terdengar dengan jelas. Suara dari depan kamar ketika orang melintas kamar kita juga selalu terdengar dengan jelas. 

5. Bathroom (rating ✴✴✴✴)
Plus : 
- kamar mandi cukup luas. 
- kebersihan kamar mandi juga cukup terjaga dengan baik. 
- amenities mandi cukup lengkap dari sikat gigi, cottonbud sampai ada hair dryer juga. 
- ada 2 buah handuk besar dan 2 buah handuk kecil. 
- ada shower buat mandi yg dilengkapi dengan air panas dan dingin.
- ada kran kecil untuk berwudhu. 
- ada wastafel yg dilengkapi dengan air panas dan dingin. 
Minus : 
- saya agak kurang suka alat membilas di toilette karena sistemnya  alat yang diputar dan keluar dari bawah toilette. Sistem di Indonesia kayanya yg seperti itu kurang pas. 
- kemudian ketika sinus saya kambuh dan saya harus mengkompres dengan handuk panas, pada jam 2 subuh air panas di kamar mandi baik di shower maupun di wastafel tidak maksimal panasnya, atau bisa dibilang tidak ada panasnya malah. Saya tidak tau apakah memang sistem air panas pada jam tersebut sengaja dimatikan atau rusak. Karena 2 malam berturut2 pada malam kedua dan ketiga selalu begitu antara jam 2 subuh sampai jam 4 subuh.

6. Food & Beverage (rating ✴✴✴)
Plus : 
- makanan rasanya cukup enak.
- ada berbagai minuman dari jus sampai dengan kopi atau teh. 
- makanan utama cukup bervariasi setiap harinya. 
- ada pempek setiap harinya.
Minus : 
- tidak ada croissant di stole roti. 
- untuk ukuran bintang 4 biasanya suka ada variasi makanan japannesse food seperti sushi. 

KESIMPULAN : 
Hotel ini salah satu hotel termegah di palembang. Saya liat setiap harinya selalu ramai. Sedikit kekurangan diatas dibenahin dan yg sudah baik dipertahankan akan menjadi hotel yg sangat favorit buat saya apabila berkunjung ke palembang. Dengan  budget yg tidak teralu mahal apalagi membeli ke agen travel on-line hotel Grand Zuri Palembang saya sangat rekomendasikan untuk para pembaca Tripadvisor dan para kolega saya yang berkunjung ke palembang untuk di coba.

Tips : 
Minta view yg melihat ke swimming pool.
title: Hotel Bintang 4 Yg Rekomendasi Di Palembang

text: Saya ke Palembang pada biasanya menginap di hotel ini karena lokasi hotel sangat strategis, berada di pusat kota dan terdapat banyak restoran di sekitar hotel. Pelayanan staff front desk sangat ramah. Harga kamarnya cukup baik, kamar serta kamar mandinya bersih.
title: "Grand Zuri"

text: Lokasi yang strategis, dekat denga pusat kota dan pusat jajanan khas palembang. Staff yg sigap dan ramah, kamar juga baik, modern dan bersih. Sarapan pagi nya enak, ada makanan khas palembang dan menu international tentunya.
title: Salah satu hotel terbaik di palembang

text: Harga sekitar 600rb, menyediakan fasilitas cukup lengkap, untuk kuliner malam cukup banyak di sekitar hotel, pagi hari cukup ramai katena terletak dekat pasar, sarapan cukup baik tapi fasilitas parkir kurang luas, beberapa rekan perusahaan lain cukup puas dengan hotel ini & kembali menginap jika ke palembang.
title: Hotel murah

text:
Lokasi hotel strategis di jalan Rajawali, Palembang, berseberangan dengan Rajawali Village (mall), restoran dan warung kopitiam kalau bosan dengan makanan hotel.
Kamar hotel dan tempat tidur sangat bersih. Amenities lengkap, tetapi sabun dan shampoo menggunakan produk 3 in 1.
Variasi menu sarapan baik, restoran nya pun tidak terasa sesak walau sedang ramai pengunjung. Pelayanan di reception maupun oleh house keeping cepat dan memuaskan.
title: Bagus

text: Kamarnya lumayan gedeyyy, kasurnya juga empuk nyaman banget, cocok buat istirahat sm keluarga maupun sm temen, apalgi buat rayain surprse ulang tahun, makanan enak2, kamar mandi oke, air panasnya juga, TOP banget dah nih hotel rekomennn
title: Happy birthday 🎉

owner_response.text:
Yth Bapak Haidi, kami ucapkan banyak terima kasih atas masukan terhadap Grand Zuri Hotel Palembang, suatu kebanggaan bagi kami bisa melayani Bapak dengan baik. Kami tunggu kedatangan berikutnya

John Johan Tisera
General Manager.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Lokasi hotel dekat dengan tempat makan seperti rumah makan beringin,pempek candy, sari rasa, dan kopitiam, dekat mall rajawali village. Hotel ini memilki kamar yang luas. Reservasi cepat dan pelayanan staff cepat dan ramah
title: Lokasi dekat pusat keramaian

text: Lokasi di tengah pusat kota palembang,harga terjangkau,full service,staf ramah dan kemana-mana dekat.makanannya enak dan banyak variasi.kamarnya cukup luas dan lantai dengan karpet yang tebal dan ac dingin
title: Hotel dengan lokasi tengah kota

text:
Menginap di hotel ini sangat menyenangkan, setiap kali ke palembang saya selalu menginap di hotel ini, selalu menyenangkan dan nyaman.
Tetapi untuk tahun ini berbeda, saya ditempatkan di lantai 5 dimana 1 lantai dibawahnya merupakan tempat gym.
Dan kenyamanan tersebut seketika hilang, kamar besar dan lux yang selalu dijaga kebersihan dan kenyamanannya sirna karena bunyi semua alat-alat gym yang dibanting dan menggelinding. Sangat-sangat menggangu begitu jelas bunyi alat-alat tersebut di kamar tempat saya menginap sampai dengan jam 9 malam.
Keesokan harinya saya dipindahkan ke lantai 6, dan kenyamanan itu kembali datang.

Semoga manajemen hotel bisa mencari cara untuk membungkus tempat gym tersebut sehingga kedap suara.
Kasihan ketika orang menginap untuk istirahat dan mencari kenyamanan malah terganggu dengan hal-hal yang menjengkelkan tersebut.
title: Hotel yang nyaman tapi...

text: Apakah krn ada event shg hamper semua hotel besar di Palembang penuh tamu, hal ini juga terjadi di Grand Zuri, saat baru tiba pagi di Palembang kami sdh diminta konfirmasi kamar shg hrs check in terlebih dahulu kemudian menyelesaikan pekerjaan. Mendapat no-smoking room ternyata aroma asap rokok masih menyengat di kamar. Fasilitas & amenities dalam kamar tergolong lengkap bahkan closet kamar mandi termasuk yg modern, kualitas tempat tidur nyaman shg bias istirahat dgn tenang walaupun lokasi hotel di area bisnis district. Menu sarapan lengkap walaupun tdk mencicipi semua yg dihidangkan krn keterbatasan meja makan, sendok-garpu, gelas bersih bahkan karyawan yg melayani kurang shg utk menyiapkan menu, menghidangkan & membersihkan meja perlu waktu lama.
title: Pelayanan Standard

text: Grand Zuri Palembang letaknya dekat pusat kota dan pusat kuliner di Palembang. Hotelnya bersih dan nyaman. Pelayanannya cukup bagus. Dengan harga yang tidak terlalu mahal, hotel ini menjadi sangat favorit di Palembang.
title: Hotel Dekat Kota

text: Keren dah grand zuri hotel ny bagus bersih nyaman, karyawan ramah... mknan ny enak pilihan yg tepat kalo sedang dipalembang untuk chekin dihotel ini... karyawan fo ny cantik2 hahahahah love zuri muaaaaah
title: Keren

text: Hotel ini terletak tdk jauh dr janrtung kota pelambang, hotel dgn suasana nyaman walaupun terletak di Jl.Rajawali  yg terkenal lumayan padat dan ramai. Pelayanan dari para kary ramah dan cepat tanggap, terbukti ketika ac di kamar saya menginap bermasalah, saya lapor dan tdk lama teknisi datang, dalam beberapa saat ac sudah normal kembali. Untuk fasilitas kebugaran ada tersedia fitnes, kolam renang dll, sedangkan sarapan menu2 makanan menggugah selera, ada jg makan khas plg yang disajikan berganti-ganti setiap hari, serta di sekitar hotel banyak tersedia jajanan kuliner2 pilihan serta coffee2...Silahkan datang dan mencoba sendiri..
title: Grand Zuri, Grand Fasilities

text: Hotel ini sangat efisien, pelayanan cepat dan ramah, lokasi yang setrategis, harga yang kompetitip, dan suasana kamar yang modern, jaringan wifi yang cepat. Saat saya menginap di kamar 702 tanggal 14-15 April 2015 kendala yang ditemui adalah air panar di kamar mandi yang "tidak panas".
title: Hotel yang nyaman dekat tempat kuliner di tengah kota

text: Saya menginap 4 malam untuk bisnis dan stay di kamar 634. Pelayanan pada saat check in dihandle oleh reception wanita yg ramah dan sgt membantu. Bellboy juga ramah. Kondisi kamar oke, tp tidak saat malam hari krn terdengar suara dengungan mesin yg keras sekali sampai sakit kepala. Pas dengan kondisi saya yg kurang tidur dan perlu tidur cukup tp suara mesin sangat sangat mengganggu. Sy telp front desk jam 10 malam, reception wanita yg menjawab telp saya sgt tidak membantu, hanya berkata "baik kami check. Terima kasih" dan langsung tutup telepon tanpa membiarkan sy bicara. Sampai sekarang tdk ada langkah yg dilakukan. Suara mesin masih terdengar keras, tdk menawarkan sy untuk pindah kamar atau lainnya. Very dissapointed.
title: Front Desk Staff TIDAK ramah

text:
Persiapan acara pernikahan kami tgl 15 feb 2015..kami Sempat bingung memilih hotel yg nyaman dan dgn budget rata" untuk keluarga.. Setelah memilih hotel" di kota Palembang kami memilih hotel ini.. Karena lokasi yang tidak terlalu jauh dari bridal Viin, gereja YHS untuk upacara pemberkatan dan gedung Selebriti tempat pesta pernikahan kami.. 
Kami mendapat special price karena pesanan kami mencapai 20 kamar untuk 3 hari..
Hotel ini cukup nyaman.. Untuk yg ingin memesan smoking room sebaikny di pikir lagi dan cb di cek dlu, karena pengalaman sebelumny kami book smoking room.. Ternyata bau asap rokok yg sangat menyengat.. Apabila memesan kamar yg bebas rokok akan dikenakan charge 250 rb jika ketahuan merokok di kamar.. Jadi lebih baik dipikir dulu kalau mau merokok di kamar..hotel ini dilengkapi kolam renang, sauna dan fitnes.. Hanya saja kami lupa mempersiapkan baju renang.. Karena tidak diperkenankan berenang kalau ga pake baju renang.. Tetapi pihak hotel menyediakan baju pinjaman (ukuran besar).. Untuk breakfast hotel ini menyediakan berbagai makanan.. Yang bebas dipilih.. Jangan lupa Restoran tutup jam 10.. Karena bertepatan dengan valentine pihak hotel menyediakan photo booth dengan latar menara Pissa saat malam valentine.. Selain tamu yg menginap jg untuk tamu yg memesan paket dinner disana..
Hotel yang menyenangkan..
title: Hotel keluarga  untuk acara pernikahan

text:
Hotel yang berada di tengah kota Palembang.
Harga yang ditawarkan cukup menarik.
sarapan juga beragam.
disekitar jg banyak teradapat resto dan cafe yang mempunyai rasa yang cukup enak.
Kamar yang bersih.
staff yang ramah.
title: Hotel di Tengah Kota

text:
Kami tinggal di hotel ini pas liburan Imlek sekalian mengunjungi saudara yang kebetulan tinggal dekat dari Hotel Grand Zuri. Kami sangat senang karena kamarnya bersih, rapi dan cukup nyaman untuk anak saya dan memiliki connecting room. Hotel ini sangat strategis karena banyak sekali kopitiam dan restoran di depan hotel. Breakfast nya sangat variatif dan enak , setiap hari ada makanan khas palembang seperti model, tekwan, ragit....enak sekali

Tapi ada beberapa kekurangan yang perlu kami sampaikan :
1. Kamar saya menghadap jalan besar dimana sound proof nya kurang bagus, terdengar sekali bila ada motor atau mobil ngebut, dan di depan pintu kamar bila ada yang berjalan atau berbicara sangat jelas

2. Air panas hanya tersedia malam - pagi hari saja, selebihnya tidak ada air panas
karena waktu anak saya habis berenang jam 2an ketika mau mandi, tidak ada air panas sama sekali

BIla bisa di perbaiki maka hotel ini akan jadi hotel favorit saya setiap ke Palembang
title: Hotel oke ditengah kota

text: Saya menginap disini untuk kedua kalinya dan menurut saya granzuri masih tetap hotel terbaik di Palembang. Lokasinya mudah dijangkau dan kamarnya bersih serta terawat. Pelayanan cukup baik. Sayangnya fitness center mengecewakan dan butuh perbaikan.
title: hotel bintang harga melati

text: Kamarnya bersih dan luas, restorannya cukup besar dan makanannya enak dan beragam jenisnya, pelayanannya baik, lokasi hotelnya cukup dekat dengan pusat kota. Fasilitas di dalam hotel pun cukup lengkap  tapi area parkirnya sangat kecil.
title: Hotel Grand Zuri is a Good Hotel

text:
Kamar bagus, pelayanan ok, fasilitas baik.
Untuk yang menginap beberapa hari, sarapan pagi terasa kurang variatif.
Chef-datang agak siang, sehingga saat kita akan memesan olahan telur (omelet, telur mata sapi), ternyata belum datang padahal sudah jam 6 lewat, sedangkan waktu sarapan jam 6.00.
title: Pelayanan Hotel
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan grandzuri.com

text:
Grand Zuri Palembang terletak di Jalan Rajawali dan tak jauh dari pusat kota Palembang. Dari hotel, Palembang Square Mall bisa ditempuh dengan berkendara sekitar 10 menit.

Di dekat hotel ada salah satu bangunan bersejarah sekaligus objek wisata di Palembang yaitu Benteng Kuto Besak, jaraknya sekitar 10 menit berkendara dari hotel. Untuk ke Stadion Gelora Sriwijaya dari hotel, dibutuhkan waktu sekitar 15 menit berkendara.

Dari Bandara Internasional Sultan Mahmud Badaruddin II, Grand Zuri Palembang dapat ditempuh dalam waktu sekitar 30 menit berkendara.

Di depan hotel tersebut ada tempat nongkrong, yaitu Rajawali Kopitiam yang telah lama berdiri dan menawarkan sajian nikmat dan tempat yang nyaman ala tempo doeloe.

Lokasi Makanan Khas, yaitu Pempek. Jaraknya sangat dekat, salah satu tempat yang terkenal ialah Pempek Candy, cm 15 meter dari hotel Grand Zuri (depan hotel). Adapula Pempek Beringin yang berjarak sekitar 20 meter yang berada di sebelah kiri hotel tersebut. Sangat dekat dengan tempat oleh2 kan. So ini merupakan tempat yang strategis buat menginap.. :)
title: Good Hotel, Good Area

text: Secara keseluruhan hotel ini cukup baik, untuk pelayanan dan fasilitas didalam hotel saya rasa sangat nyaman untuk hotel sekelas grand zuri ini. Namun satu minus pointnya terletak di parking area yang sangat minim di kawasan hotel, sehingga pihak hotel harus menggunakan fasilitas parkir di jalan seberang samping hotel. Hal ini yg menutut saya sangat membuat tamu hotel yang membawa kendaraan pribadi menjadi sangat nyaman, baik untuk tamu yang menginap di hotel maupun tamu yang mengunjungi rekan atau kerabatnya dihotel ini. Disaat cuaca panas terik, maka tamu akan meras gerah untuk jalan dari parkiran untuk masuk ke lobby hotel yang sekit memutar. Begitu juga pada saat hujan (yang saya alami saat hujan deras) kami harus parkir di lokasi tersebut dan berhujan ria menuju ke lobby hotel. Di parking area tidak disediakan payung, sementara beberapa petugas yg berdiri didepan lobby hotel terlihat memegang payung. Saya hanya berfikir untuk apa memegang payung di depan lobby hotel. Overall untuk fasilitas lain cukup baik, pelayanan tetap terjaga walaupun hotel ini sudah beberapa tahun. Saya sendiri sudah beberapa kali menginap disini dari sejak awal berdirinya hotel ini.
title: Comfortable hotel

text: Hotel ini artisitk. Kamarnya bagus, bersih dan nyaman. Untuk sarapan lumayanlah banyak variasinya. Lokasinya cukup baiks sehingga ramai.Didekatnya lumayan banyak yang jualan dan bisa cari oleh-oleh. Jadi tepatlah jika Anda menginap di sini
title: Hotel yang Cukup Nyaman

text:
Saya menginap 1 malam saja di sini.
mendapat kamar di lanta 8, beberapa tembok agak retak2.
Minta kasur king size, tapi diberikan 2 kasur single dijadikan satu, tidak nyaman sama sekali. Kasur keras dan tidak nyaman juga.

aturan di fitness center cukup aneh, jika tamu hotel menggunakan fasilitas ini tidak mendapatkan loker, alasannya takut kunci loker dikembalikan. Alasan yang aneh.
jadi loker hanya khusus untuk member fitness center,padahal fitness center juga biasa aja, kecil dan alatnya sedikit. Jual mahal.

Service front desk juga kurang baik, menunggu 1 orang saja sampai 20 menit untuk check in.
pegawai juga jutek, mungkin saya darang hanya pakai ransel, celana bermuda dan kaos, beda dengan tamu2 yang lain.

menu sarapan pagi juga biasa aja, tidak ada special sama sekali.

overall, denga harga yang dibayarkan dibandingkan dengan service yang diberikan, buruk.

dengan lokasi hotel juga, akhirnya tidak direkomendasikan.
title: Pelayanan buruk

text:
nice hotel.. menu juga beragam.. 
staff juga sangat ramah..
kamar juga sangan bersih & nyaman.. 
namun saya mendapatkan handuk yang seperti nya kurang bersih waktu pencuciannya sehingga masih terlihat bekas kotoran..
jadi sedikit mengecewakan..
title: bagus aja sih...

text:
Hotel ini cukup bagus, kualitas kamar juga cukup bagus. Yang menarik itu ada mpek2 di sarapan. tapi beberapa hotel di Palembang juga menyediakan mpek2 di menu sarapan mereka. Walau lokasi nya tidak begitu strategis, tapi untuk cari oleh2 mpek2 ada mpek2 candy di seberangnya, kalau mau makan pindang juga ada di dekat hotel tapi harus naik kendaraan. Untuk Kendaraan hanya ada Taksi dan Becak. Kalau mau pakai rental hotel juga relatif murah. 
Sewaktu menginap disini siy kondisi lagi rame, banyak yg menginap di Hotel ini.
title: Hotel Bagus di Palembang

text:
hotel grand zuri saya rekomendasikan untuk anda yang berkunjung ke kota palembang

pertama; layanan petugas responsif dan mau membantu kami memaasukkan barang2 tas hingga menanyakaan lokasi sebuah alamat secara detail,

kedua; kamar bersih dengan furnitur modern minimalis, dan yang terpenting kamar mandi nya cukup luas dan sekali lagi bersih

ketiga : menu sarapan cukup beragam, coba mie celor nya..enak dan saya rekomendasikan.

keempat : di depan hotel ada koptiam (kalau bosan menu hotel) dan beberapa toko pempek buat oleh
title: recomend hotel @ palembang

text: Hotel yang nyaman, bersih, pelayanan yang ramah serta pilihan makanan yang cukup bervariasi untuk sarapan. Walaupun lokasi hotel tidak ditengah kota, tapi tidak terlalu jauh untuk dicapai. Overall, menginap di hotel ini cukup memuaskan kebutuhan istirahat saya.
title: Bersih, nyaman dan ramah

text: Di Palembang untuk kunjungan kerja belakangan ini, hotel ini pilihan utama saya. Bersih, nyaman, staf hotel ramah, lokasi strategis dan harganya pantas. Sayang tempat parkirnya agak terbatas. Untung hotel menyediakan tempat parkir tambahan di seberang. Terakhir menginap perlengkapan fitnesnya sudah tua dan terbatas. Mudah-mudah bisa segera ada peremajaan. Tapi kolam renang kecilnya cukup bagus.
title: Bersih, nyaman & harganya pantas.

text: Kenyamanan sangat di perlukan demi kelancaran acara yang saya hadiri..mulai penerbangan, penginapan, termasuk lokasi yang dekat dengan acara..itu semua saling mendukung.. Hingga semua bisa berjalan dengan sempurna..dan sangat memuaskan thanks
title: Luar Biasa

text: beberapa bulan lalu  saya menginap disini untuk keperluan Dinas. Karena Letaknya yang dekat dengan kantor, saya memilih Hotel Grand Zuri Palembang. Selain itu, Hotel ini dekat dengan pusat jajanan  serta mudah  daerah wisata kota Palembang. Aksesnya sangat mudah serta pelayanan yang memuaskan. Kamar superior dengan harga yang masuk akal ditata dengan baik, dan dengan fasilitas wifi sangat cepat. Saya waktu itu sempat tertinggal barang saat check out, namun manajemen menyimpan barang saya dengan rapi dan dengan prosedur pengambilan yang sangat ketat, hal ini menginidkasikan hotel menjamin  barang pelanggan yang tertinggal terjaga dengan aman
title: Mudah diakses dan Nyaman

owner_response.text:
Cianida Bienvenida del Grand Zuri Hotel Palembang...

The city where it will host the 18th Asian Games on 18 08 2018.

Dear Valuable Guest,

Thank you for the comments and ratings given to us. it is our team's duty to provide the best service to our guests.
We are currently in the clean-up phase with the addition of 50 new rooms, 3 parking levels that direct access to the Hotel, Ball Room, Thematic out let at Rooftop, Sky Pool and a larger fitness room equipped with new and advanced equipment.

Hopefully it will all add a sense of comfort to our customers.
Please keep returning to Hotel Grand Zuri Palembang for your next visit. We will be happy to welcome and serve you again.

Muchas Gracias.....

Saludos Cardiales | Gumay | Marketing Communcation & E-Commerce
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Dalam rangka tugas / urusan bisnis, saya dan kolega berkunjung ke kota Palembang pada tanggal 16 s/d 17 September 2014.
Saya menginap dihotel Grand Zuri, yang terletak di tengah kota, tepatnya di Jalan Rajawali, Palembang.
Selama menginap saya pribadi terkesan dengan hotel Grand Zuri. Hotel ini bersih dan kondisi ruang kamar yang saya tempati nomer 623,  nyaman, dan menghadap ke jalan raya, dari segi fasilitas cukup baik, seperti standar TV (cable), AC, Meja & kursi dsb. 
Lokasi hotel Grand Zuri sangat strategis, karena diseberang hotel tersedia beberapa restoran, café, bahkan toko yang menjajakan oleh-oleh khas Palembang ( kerupuk, empek2 dll).
Saat breakfast, kuliner yang disediakan cukup lengkap, termasuk makanan khas Palembang juga disediakan (empek-empek).
Waktu Check out,  resepsionis (Ibu Ririn) yang melayani kami memberikan keramahan yang baik
Apabila saya berkunjung kembali ke kota Palembang nanti, hotel ini akan menjadi perhatian dari saya kembali.

- dr. Irwan Widjaja-
Jakarta - Anggota Garuda Miles
title: Bermalam di hotel Grand Zuri Palembang

photos.caption: Saat breakfast dan kondisi yang cukup ramai

text:
Grand Zuri adalah hotel bintang 3 yang sangat memuaskan.
Pertama kali datang saya senang dengan lobi yg luas, interior yang baru, bersih, dan modern.
Sesampainya di kamar pun, kamarnya cukup luas dan bersih.
Di lantai 3 terdapat kolam renang dan gym yang juga bersih.
Sarapannya pun lengkap dan enak. Selama menginap 3 malam, setiap hari menu makanan utamanya pun berganti-ganti.

Lokasinya terdapat di pusat kota & hampir selalu ada taksi blue bird yang siap sedia di lobby hotel. Dan yang cukup membuat perut saya happy adalah ada restoran pempek terkenal di sebelah dan di seberang hotel Grand Zuri :)
Dengan harganya yg tergolong ekonomis, bagi saya hotel ini sangat memuaskan!
title: Nyaman dan Bersih

text: Ketika saya memasuki hotel ini, kesan bersih dan rapi sudah mulai terlihat sejak di lobi hotel. Nuansanya cukup membuat nyaman bagi yang memilih hotel ini untuk beristirahat di Palembang. Kelemahan hotel ini menurut saya adalah ukuran kamarnya yang kurang luas, sehingga kurang leluasa saat akan bekerja di kamar. Kelebihannya adalah menu sarapan yang disediakan cukup variatif, kamar yang tidak berisik serta ramahnya staf hotel.
title: Small but Clean

text:
Setiap saya melakukan perjalanan ke Palembang, Pilihan untuk bermalam pasti ke Grand Zuri, 
1. Hotelnya bersih, kamar, lobby, restaurant dll..
2. Karyawannya Ramah-ramah,
3. Breakfast variatif
4. Pelayanan Cepat
5. Letak yang strategis di pusat kota

Recommended Hotel!!!
title: Pasti ke sini

text: Pas di lobby hotel nyamuk lumayan banyak. Meski sudah ada alat pengusir nyamuk. Masuk di kamar koq juga ada meski cuma 1 ekor yang saya dapati. Pelayanannya bagus dan ramah. Kamarnya juga bagus. Fasilitas dan lokasi juga Ok.
title: Hotel bagus tapi bernyamuk

text: Tertarik dengan harga promo yang di tawarkan di hari lebaran kemarin , kami akhirnya memutuskan untuk tinggal di hotel ini selama kami pulang kampung di palembang.  pelayanan yang ramah dan cepat, kamar standard yang bersih, lokasi yang tidak jauh dari pusat kota, menu breakfast yang variatif, disetiap menu breakfast pasti terselip makanan tradisional palembang, setiap hari berganti ada tekwan, laksan dan model semua rasanya enak. sayangnya lahan parkir dihotel ini sangat minim. secara keseluruhan puas dengan harga dan pelayanan serta fasilitas hotel ini.
title: cukup puas menginap di sini

text: Saya sering menginap di hotel ini saat dinas di Palembang, karena lokasinya dekat dengan kantor kami. Lokasinya strategis, dekat dengan beberapa restoran, antara lain sate kambing Soepardi, dan ATM. Kamar bersih dan rapi, tidak terlalu kecil juga tidak terlalu besar. Kamar mandi dan amenities tersedia dan terawat dengan baik. Sarapan banyak pilihan dan rasanya enak.
title: Tempat tinggal yang nyaman

text:
kami menginap pada saat Ramadhan dengan harga promo Ramadhan.  hotel baru dan bersih, lorong dan kamar full karpet yang masih baru, hotel di pusat kota, banyak jajanan di luar hotel. text:
Di tengah kota Palembang dan dengan banyaknya hotel yang ada di kota Palembang membuat para pengusaha perhotelan berlomba untuk memberikan pelayanan yang terbaik kepada tamu. Hal ini juga dilakukan oleh Hotel Grand Zuri Palembang. dengan memiliki lokasi yang strategis dan dengan bangunan yang baru membuat Hotel Grand Zuri Palembang mampu bersaing dengan hotel lainnya. 
Dari sisi makanan Grand Zuri Palembang sangat memanjakan para tamu dengan menu-menu masakan yang memiliki banyak variasi dan citarasa tinggi. Namun ada sedikit kekecewaan dari saya ketika saya pernah menitipkan kunci kamar kepada receptionist tetapi justru saya seperti diintrogasi oleh petugas disana seakan-akan saya tidak pernah menitipkan kunci dan menghilangkan kunci. Tetapi kekecewaan itu saya coba hilangkan dan saya menganggap dengan demikian keamanan kamar saya terjamin dan menjadi prioritas utama mereka untuk menjaga keamanan disana. 
Untuk kenyamanan parkir kurang nyaman dikarenakan lokasi parkir berseberangan dengan hotel terutama pada saat hujan karena pihak hotel tidak menyediakan valley parking.
title: Hotel di Tengah Kota Palembang

text:
Saya menginap di hotel ini untuk kegiatan rapat kantor selama 3 hari. Lokasi hotel berada di dalam kota dengan suasana sekitar yang cukup nyaman dan tidak crowded. Didepan hotel terdapat rumah makan dan rumah kopi. Cuma yang disayangkan di hotel tidak ada fasilitas ATM. ATM terdekat sekitar 100 meter dari hotel (BNI) sedangkan ATM Mandiri lebih jauh lagi.
Untuk penerimaan tamu pada saat chekcin cukup baik. Suasana lobi juga cukup nyaman dengan penerangan yang cukup. Disebelah lobi terdapat restaurant yang berfungsi sebagai tempat sarapan di pagi hari. Untuk mengakses kamar kita diberi kunci akses yang juga berfungsi sebagai kunci akses lift, ini yang sering jadi masalah ketika kita datang dengan rombongan dan ditempatkan pada lantai yang berbeda. Karena kita tidak bisa mengakses lantai lain selain dari lantai kamar kita. 
Untuk kamar cukup lega, suasana kamar modern minimalis, dengan penataan yang rapih dan bersih. Tersedia Televisi layar lebar, sambungan internet melalui Wifi cukup kencang.
Kamar mandi yang ada cukup bersih, handuk juga harum dan lembut. 
Sarapan pagi yang disediakan cukup variatif dan menurut ukuran lidah saya sangat enak, tersedia juga makanan lokal pempek.
Overall hotel ini cukup baik untuk direkomendasikan, diluar kekurangan-kekurangan kecilnya.
Salam
title: Hotel Patut Direkomendasikan

text: Saya menginap di hotel ini karea ada acara keluarga yang harus saya hadiri. Hotel dibangun menjelang pelaksanaan SEA GAMES di Palembang tahun lalu. Hotel berada di jalan yang tidak dilalui kendaraan umum sehingga agak sulit menuju hotel bila tidak menggunakan kendaraan sendiri. Tapi tidak usah kuatir karena di Palembang saat ini sudah ada taksi BlueBird yang harganya cukup murah dan dapat dipanggil menjemput ke hotel. Hotel ini memiliki lobby yang bagus sekali, hanya saja saya tidak suka dengan sofa di lobby yang menurut saya tidak nyaman karena tidak ada sandaran kepala. Petugas di hotel ini sangat ramah dengan pelayanannya baik sekali. Kamar hotel sangat bersih dengan tempat tidur yang sangat empuk dan LCD TV yang besar dengan channel TV yang komplit. Kamar mandinya juga bagus dengan air panas yang berfungsi cukup baik. Fasilitas hotel lain seperti kolam renang dan fitness center juga cukup baik. Saya suka sekali bersantai di lounge lantai 2 yang menghadap ke jalan sembari menikmati juice buah yang segar. Sarapan pagi di Cerenti Coffee Shop memiliki pilihan menu yang cukup baik dengan kualitas makanan yang baik pula. Disekitar hotel ada banyak pilihan restoran dan cafe yang bisa dicapai dengan berjalan kaki saja. Hotel ini layak untuk direkomendasikan.
title: Bintang 3 Rasa Bintang 4

text:
NOTE: (Mid Dec 2016) The hotel is undergoing expansion and building a ballroom next door and when I was there, they are putting the foundation and can get really noisy during the days if you room is facing the back. I was disappointed to find out about this after I am in the room, expected to put up with the noise and still pay full rates.They moved me to the street facing room, which has a slight traffic noise but better. 

I have stayed here few times and in the past been giving my review 4 stars. This time, I stayed here after 2 other hotels at the same ratings and I notice what Grand Zuri lacks of. ONE: Nice white fluffy towels. All the towels, even after request, are old and off white colours. TWO: new bed. My first room, I can feel the springs on my back. I was moved to different room and the bed is slightly better but still need replacing.
I have few issues during this stay, apart from the construction, have to move room and the wifi, phone and the fridge wasn't working at the new room. The showerhead also need replacing.
The staff need to turn their loud crackling radio down a little while in the hallway as the noise travels to the bedroom.

My PLUS POINTS staying here:
- All my concern, complaint, request and issues are taken care off straight away with friendly attitude
- Staff from doorman to housekeeping are ready to help with big smile
- Breakfast has good variety. The hot foods changes everyday with selection of local food, western and chinese foods on top of the usual fruits, cereals, toasts, egg corners, pastries and juices.
- Room is clean and tidy and bed tucked well.

I would love to come back and stay here again, but if things not improving, I am afraid customers might try newer hotel next door.
title: Very good service, but is it enough?

text:
I checked in last Sunday, 24 July, 2016. Room Key doesn't work, red light flickering but when I pull down the handle, the door can not be opened. Go down again to reception but many people line-up and only one girl in-charged.
Finally door man came and asked if he can help me. I have told him my problem, in room 717, and he punched-in the key again and told me, now it will work. He said the red light will be on and just push down the handle and push the door. That's what I did, I told him. Anyway now it works.
Air-conditioning is not cold enough, anyway, I was so tired, it was 10 pm already, so it don't bother me any more. Woke up 6 am, go for breakfast but many people from government which probably they are attending a seminar. I have told the greeter if I can leave my hand luggage with her. Without looking at me she said: NO! Go to reception she said so arrogantly. The breakfast so bad, 2 star category. Everything was cold. Bubur ayam was cold, I order Mie Ayam in the corner, a trainee who served ala minutes, but again it was cold. I came back and asked for.fried eggs, but no one was there, but when I look around he was knee down having his breakfast behind the table, the poor guy than was so shock looked at me with full of food in his mouth and try to give me ready cooked omelette.  I said, can I have fried eggs, The poor guy say yes pak with still full of food in his mouth. I said don't worry, just finish your breakfast first. And I went to Tea and Coffee table self service. The tea was cold, and over cooked, so dark like coffee already. Orange juice was not available, only grapes juice. and water. And I went to take some sausages in shaving dish, but again its cold already. So at the end I don't feel to have my breakfast.  It was the 6 anniversary of the hotel, I thought I am going to have a good breakfast, but probably no supervision from the Manager, so it was loosing here and there. It's a pity,. But before my departure, I was served with very nice smile and very helpful doorman and bell boy who over me help for my luggage. Fantastic, they make my day.
title: 3 Star Hotel Services

text: I stayed at the hotel for one night. Rooms were clean and new and a decent size too for the standard Queen Sized room. Bed was comfy and pleasantly had a bolster pillow as well (which I personally love). Shower was also good. good wifi speed and signals too! All the key ingredients for a good business traveller hotel. There are quite a number of good restaurants within walking distance of the place. The local mall is a bit further, but still easily accessible by a short taxi ride. Breakfast was reasonable, not as bad as some have reviewed it to be. Good value for money.
title: Good Business hotel

owner_response.text:
Warm Greeting From Grand Zuri Palembang........


Dear   Mr. Yunus

General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I have stayed here before few years ago and decided to stayed here again as I enjoyed my last stay at the junior suite with my family. This time I booked 2 connecting superior room. 
The check-in was quick and when we got to our room, it was nice and clean.
We have one twin beds and the other room have a queen bed. The superior room comes with shower only, no bath tub. 
Our room is non smoking on the level 6 looking down to the pool area on level 3. It was quiet. The bed is comfortable and the pillow are fluffy. There is tea coffee and 2 free water bottles a day in the bathroom. 
The room also offer free wifi and the connection is good although you need to re-connect after period of time. 
Bathroom is clean enough, if I am being picky, I can see mould on some of the grouts and noticed little sugar ants around the bathroom, otherwise, shower is enjoyable, towels clean. 
The room also comes with breakfast and it offers good selection of food, from locals to western food. Kids also catered for with hot milo and chocolate cereals :)
The service in this hotel is excellent. Our visiting family member had incident at the pool and the GM was there straight away and look after us, and make sure all is good, thank you. I will definitely recommend this hotel and will stay here again on my next visit.
title: Good value and comfortable hotel

owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. San Shine 
We appreciate you for taking time to share with us your experience while at The Grand Zuri Palembang . Thank you for your positive and negative comments. I am continuously working with my team to ensure flawless service and to produce great experiences for our guests 

Regarding our bathroom’s rubber seal which there was some  mould already  on our program to replace. 
And also it is embarrassing to us that you found ants around the bathroom,, I already informed to my House keeping  manager together with the insect killer company deeply look into it and take a necessary action as soon as possible. Just to make sure it will not be happened to the other guest.


I Hope you will give as a change to serve you even better and we will ensure your stay are just as memorable the second time. I look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel.

Warmest Regards,


John Johan Tisera
General Manager

text: Strategic location, nearby from many restaurant, friendly staff, the breakfast is nice they have many option for breakfast, clean room, gym, swimming pool, free wifi.. Very recommended hotel to you stay in Palembang...
title: Nice place

text:
The Grand icon at the brand name supposed to have a grand services and professional staff. Comfortable lobby and rooms.

Lucky I only stay for one night. Check in and out process is fast, concierge do a great job. Overall was okay. It's could be great if the room lighting brighter, bed was not comfort and pillow sheet is not smooth, some are quite old. Very simple amenities but acceptable. Shower running well and wifi is fast. But disconnect many times, need to reconnect often, this is quite annoying. 

My room facing to swim pool, very small and crowd. The gym all occupied, nearly can't get turn.

Breakfast was okay, quite lots of variety, design of coffee shop is nice too, finally I found something good for compliment, staff in front of coffee shop respond well, but when entering no one greeting, and get confused where to seat. 
Good location because is near to culinary points and no traffic.

Suggest for Hotel, lobby need to change the sofa style, it's really not represent for Grand in front of Zuri, maybe for Zuri Express.
I feel not comfortable sitting there waiting for business college to pick up or  ether way.
title: Best Location

text:
It was my first stay at this hotel on September 2015.I spent 1 night only for catching morning flight to Jakarta. Generally it was a new hotel, room was comfort and also politeness of the employee. There was free wifi provided in the room, room amenities was complete if you forgot to bring your personal amenities.
 
Breakfast menu also have a lot of variety include local delicacy such as Tekwan and Pempek. Check in/Check out services quite fast.And for transportation, there was taxi beside the hotel,you can get it easily just asked the bellboy.

Basically it was a good place to stay and a lot of restaurant/cafe/pujasera around the hotel.
title: Good hotel and surrounding by restaurant/cafe

text:
What i like:
1. Room design is modern
2. Location at is good as it is nearby a lot of good restaurants. Rajawali is known as a food haven in Palembang
3. Price is reasonable for a hotel near city
4. Check in and out is easy

What i dislike:
1. Guest parking are far and not clearly marked. I am told to move my car twice for parking in wrong place. Their parking is across the street
2. The worst bed and pillow i have experienced ever. And I have stayed in an inn or motel. The pillow look like they have been used for decades. The bed is terribly hard and squeaky. I actually checked that the bed was actually flipped upside down....And they smell musky and dusty. 
3. Breakfast is terrible, have small selections, food are not replenished, some food has turned cold. And i was there quite early at 6.15am....
4. Air con is not cold even if set at 15 celcius

In conclusion, i recommend staying in other area. You can get cheaper options, closer to city. In rajawali, this is the best hotel available
title: Need improvement

text:
I thought grand zuri is one of great hotel in Palembang.
but i think the service should be improved.
room cleanliness is not so good, the room is quiet gloomy, TV is so old.

But I really love the breakfast ,  many choice of food and also the WiFi is sooooooooo Fast, i loooove it !!
title: Just Good Food, Others need improvement

text:
The room is nice though not very spacious, love it because they have rugged floor. The shower is great, fast wifi, and they have smoking floor. 
The breakfast was not that special though.
Good location and there are plenty of restaurants around.
title: Nice hotel

text: Second time stay in this hotel, they still have the same good impression as the first time. Located in city center surround with even more restaurants then 2 years ago. There's pempek Bringin and pempek Candy nearby, a Kopitiam (coffee shop) and a new food center with a lot of food choice. All is just walking distance. They also setved good breakfast. Not much variation but tastes good with 1-2 local dish everyday. One food that impressed me a lot was macaroni carbonara (yes, for breakfast), it's sooooo delicious and made me forget to reduce carbo intake for breakfast. The laundry service is excellent, by the time I arrive to my room after office, the laundry was already in my room. One other good thing is WIFI was very fast.
title: Good Food, Great Location, Comfortable Room

text:
Yeay long weekend this time, we visited our friend in Palembang..
Palembang is a city that well known for its culinary like tekwan (fish meatballs), pempek, krupuk (fish crackers), pork noodles, etc.
We stayed in Grand Zuri hotel, room is comfy, food is good and hotel staffs are friendly.. 
We like to sit in the hotel lobby while waiting our friend to come to see many people entering the hotel with their belongings 😊 

As this hotel is located in the center of Palembang city, it's worth to stay here whenever you visit Palembang and would try its famous culinary for your weekend escapade..
title: Long weekend escapades

text: The room is really cozy and big enough for 3 star hotel. But unfortunately I got a room at 5th floor, which is above the gym. The sound of that gym's activities could be heard from my room and that's very very noisy. The hotel staff said that it'll stop at 8.00 p.m but it didn't. It's very frustrating. After a few arguments with the hotel supervisor the next day, I could change the room to the upper floor.. And the hotel staff sent me a plate of fruit slices as an apology..
title: Big room but a little bit disappointed

text:
This hotel located in a great place for me, near to Pempek Beringin, Pempek Candy and Magnum Kopitiam, so during my staying in hotel, no need to go further to find Pempek (Pempek is traditional food of Palembang ethnic).
The hotel itself still new, I stayed in deluxe room no. 911 at 3rd floor.
The bathroom is small, no bathtub, the heat water wasn't working well.
What I hate is their pool, it use for public not only hotel guest. So i when i want to swim, its full of a non hotel guess.

The breakfast was standard, the choice are not so much.
title: Great room with standard service

text: I've been to Palembang 3 times and tried different hotels but from now on, Grand Zuri is definitely my 1st pick. It is located not too far from the city center. You can easily find restaurant, coffeeshop and minimarket within walking distance. The room pretty spacy and clean. The gym got pretty crowded at night, but it's still nice. The breakfast is good. They changed the menu everyday and there's always asian and western food. I'll come back for sure!
title: Budget Business Traveler 1st Pick!

text: Located downtown, at the heart of Palembang. Staffs speak English quite well, great! Attentive, helpful. Room was clean and spacey enough. Would like to stay there again next visit to Palembang. Breakfast menu were variative and tasted yummy ;)
title: Stay at the heart of Palembang

text:
Plus :
+ Stable and Good Connection of wifi (love it!!!)
+ Spacious room (superior double room)
+ Nice area (kopitiam around hotel)
+ Polite staff
+ Cable TV with clear reception
+ With refrigerator, Safety Box, Kettle for Coffee & Tea
+ Good pressure of the water.

Minus :
- Minimalis amenities (just 1 pair slipper, 1 comb, 1 toothbrush-paste), shampoo & liquid soap in wall dispenser.
- Soundproof less, you can hear sound at corridor and from street.
- Asking hairdyer when i'm check in at front desk, they promise to deliver to my room. I didn't receive it, and no explanation or apology. Asking direction (to restaurant & pool) to staff hotel, she didn't give me the answer because she doesn't know. How come?
- A bit stain on the bed linen.

Didn't have chance to try the food and other hotel facility. But i'll give it a try again next visit to Palembang.
title: C+ rating

text:
I visit palembang for business purposes and stay at this hotel.

Right now I'm writing this review from the restaurant.

I prefer no smoking room with king size bed. 

The room is clean and good to me but the funny thing is the king size bed actually are 2 single bed put side by side. Photo attached. How can this 3 stars hotel make this funny bed.

I can not sleep well in this room because the air conditioner can not set to medium fan. It must set max fan which is too windy and cold so i set to medium and in the midnight when i feel hot i wake up and set the fan to the max and in few hours ahead i wake up to set it medium again.

The good thing is the pool and gym is meet the standard for exercise. 

The breakfast is standard no special thing in here.

So maybe i will consider this hotel for business trip only because it location near down town.
title: Funny king size bed

text: I stayed here for 2 night on my business trip. The front desk staff is rather unfriendly and not perceptive. The variety of breakfast menu is quite good but some of food are still not ready and cold, we had our breakfast on 6.30am. The room with the capacity for two persons is rather small and not comfortable for adding extra-bed.
title: NICE HOTEL BUT POOR SERVICE

text: Staff and room was very nice, and there is spa also and fitness and swiiming pool too. I will go this hotel again of course with my family too..one thing that is need improvement are room service they need more check the room
title: Nice

text: quite reasonable price for the hotel close to main area in Palembang, easy access to get all tourist place along the Palembang, not kind of the hotel with high traffic in front , night life available and offered some activities as well inside the main Bar, friendly staff and helpfull, always willing to show the best place to visit.
title: reasonable price

text: After traveling from Lahat during a 6 hour trip, I decided to go back to Palembang. I booked this room using one of the Internet applications on the go, and it worked! I get a single room at a price that is promising. The atmosphere is quiet and the rooms are simple. Especially when I use this room for the three of us (when capacity only for two), I was able to combine the beds and do not necessarily need the extra-bed. Hotels suitable for you who want to rest from the long journey.
title: Prices Are Friendly And The Facilities Are Pretty Good

text:
We stayed here with a group of 16 ppl,,,for 2 nightsa dn found out that the staff from front to room svc are very2 friendly and very helpful. The room is clean and comfortable thus it made our long journey from Jambi to Palembang disapeared in a shortwhile.
Beginning, when we first arrived here, nothing spectacular sorrounding the hotel, but the next day we could quickly understood its speciality.
Will come back again next time. Thaks all.
title: Very friendly staff of GZ

text: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights & I found the room very cozy, clean & neat. Our room was facing the swimming pool. There was wifi which we needed most... being a Singaporean though! The staff of this hotel are very courteous, friendly & forever having a smile on their faces... which really made your day! The general manager of this hotel, Mr Yon warmly welcomed us to his hotel. He was prompt in his actions when I told him about the room curtains that could not be moved. He immediately called for a technician to rectify the deficiency. I was impressed with Mr Yon for his guest's concerns & needs! Will definitely recommend my friends to stay at this hotel! Great job, guys!
title: Palembang Visit

text: A very cozy hotel where the staff are friendly and courteous. The manager of the hotel, Pak Yon welcomed us to his hotel. When one of my friends commented to him that the bath towel in her room was not that cleaned, it was immediately replaced with a clean & fresh one! Wow! Pak Yon is indeed very efficient & concerned with the guests' needs! Kudos to him & the staff
title: Palembang Visit

text:
Stayed for 3 nights with my friend for a business trip. The staffs were very friendly and accommodating. Arrived at the hotel at 9 am (before the check-in time), so we're entrusted our luggage  to the concierge (he gave us a card with our name and number for identity).

We already booked and paid for a superior twin, so after we checked around 12, we enter the room with a bell boy who took our luggage. Perhaps because I'm an Indonesian, they didn't ask me to leave a deposit. The room was very nice, clean, comfy, and most importantly the carpet seems really clean, since it didn't trigger my allergy.

The bathroom were very clean, provided with standard amenities (towels, toothbrush, toothpaste, shower-caps, combs, a box of tissue, and 2 bottles of drinking water-provided daily). The room also provided with coffee & tea, electric kettle, a small refrigerator (with some drinks that you have to pay) and sandals. The AC was nice and soundless.

The breakfast is delicious with many choices, like porridge, rice, potatoes, toasts, noodles and cereals. There also some local foods like "pempek" and "tekwan". Oh, and you can asked for omelet and the chef will cooked it for you! Desserts has a lot of varieties too. There's a large selection of fresh fruits, cakes, local sweets, pudding or jelly and preserved fruits. The menus were changed daily. We have tea, coffee, water, and 3 types of juices (also vary everyday). 

Hungry? Don't worry. They're some nice and delicious restaurants like "Kopitiam" and "Pempek Venus", and a bakery across the hotel.

Well, since I was on a business trip, I often used the business center. The WiFi is free (just asked the receptionist for the username and password) and really fast, even-though I was on the 5th floor. The staff at the business center are really friendly and helpful too, because I often asked their services to print or copy some documents at odd hour (let say.... 11 pm, 2 am and 4 pm). Of course I had to pay, but with their good services, the price was really worth it!

When I already checked out at the last day, I forgot that I leaved my watch at the room. Again, the receptionist was very helpful. She asked a security guard to accompany me to the room and get my watch back.

Overall, it's really nice hotel. Comfortable, clean, friendly, and very accommodating. It's just have 1 weakness though. The water pressure was weak, and if I want to take a shower at uncommon hour (let say..... 1 am), you have to wait at least 20 minutes to get some hot water in your shower (yes, turning on your shower for 20 minutes). What a waste!

I'll definitely come to this hotel again!
title: Very nice and comfortable

text:
Grand Zuri Palembang, a 3 star hotel with 4 star experience.

Positives:
+Well maintaned hotel with good management (every morning I see the management make a meeting in breakfast area).
+Staff (bell boy, receptionist, etc) all are very hospitable, I think they are happy work in Grand Zuri.
+Room: eventhough it is a 3 star, it feels like a 4 star room, very quiet and comfortable enough.
+Grand Zuri is relatively new hotel, so don't look tired at all.
+Breakfast: they have some local food like pempek, and good selection of dessert. But the main menu (other selection) is less variable, but overall is outstanding compare to other 3 star typical hotel breakfast menu.
+Good facilities here, like a free wifi, etc.

Still To Improve:
-The Bathroom, I don't like the design (lack of luxury compare to the room) and the simplicity of amenities here.
-Location, I think is little bit outside from city center (but still in city), I prefer hotel in Ahmad Rivai area (like Aryaduta), or near Kuto Besak.
-They don't sent the  newspaper in the room every morning, I think the main customer of its hotel is a business traveler, so if they give a free newspaper it will be a nice touch.

In Conclusion, overall after my 2 nights experience here, this hotel is deserved a 4 of out 5 marks from me. Grand Zuri Palembang is a hotel with 3 star rating/price but they deliver to me 4 star experience :)

Recommended: Yes, very efficient hotel, good value for the money.
Return To Sleep: Maybe Yes, if Palembang still don't have a new 4/5 star hotel especially in Ahmad Rivai area, I definitely will stay here again. But, I hear Grand Zuri management will operate this kind of hotel next year with The Premiere brand, location is unbeatable in the very downtown of Palembang.

As usual, I always include photos in each of my reviews on Tripadvisor. - It's Real Review.
title: Very Outstanding for 3 Star Hotel

We stayed there 4N/5D in two superior twin rooms.

At the first day and night the room service was good. But we realised that since then our rooms including the bathrooms were never cleaned. Its true that our beds were made up and the towels were folded (or replaced) but the carpets were not vacuumed, the desks and racks were not wiped, the bathrooms were left 'smelly' and not tidied up. text:
4 nights here on business. The staff made my stay all the better. Very courteous, and smiling all the time. I single out Chef Nur who appeared every morning talking to guests who were sampling his wonderful food. I loved the Palembang local food ... pempek, etc. Nur was caring and asked for critique! I found little to criticize! If I needed to, then it's just not this hotel...most Indonesian hotels do not put cream on the table for coffee. Instead guests have to go and get another glass of milk for coffee!

Rooms are well cleaned...again smiling and very obliging staff. The door lock is a bit confusing...in fact I had to go down twice because I didn't know the "system" of opening the door ... Duh! You tap your card, the "red dots" circle for a few moments then you can open. I was waiting, all this time, for it to turn green! Programmers don't think of us old people!

Also the "doorstopper" in the bathroom just outside the shower is dangerous...you could stub your toes easily if you're not careful...
title: Best smiles from staff

Dear Lagusaya2,

Thank you very much for giving a review on Tripadvisor, especially on our staff services that make you feel comfortable for the 4 nights you stayed, I will convey to Chef Nur that he is very polite. Cheers,
General Manager

owner_response.text:
Hi Yogi S!

My apologize for your inconvenience. About late coffee on your breakfast, yes there was missed communication at that time. I had brief our team not to happened again. I promise you, you will get your coffee on your next breakfast here. I am also surprised that your request for complimentary mineral water was not delivered right away. I checked directly with our team about complementary mineral water in your room, our standard set up mineral water is two (2) bottles per room per night and we only refill according to that amount each day. However when there is request to have more than that we will always deliver right away. My apologize again for your inconvenience to fulfill your request. 

I hope to see you again anytime soon, please send my regards to your family. Cheers!

text:
I stayed in the Grand Zuri Palembang for a 3-day business trip. When i entered the hotel, it looked very comfy and stylish, but not overdoing it. The staffs were all kind, the breakfast menu was great. i especially love the Indonesian salad, gado-gado. The rooftop swimming pool was AMAZING!! 

One thing that i am most grateful is with their service, not only during my stay but even afterwards. So i was so hurried during the check-out and left my laptop charger. Found out the next day when i arrived in Jakarta already. I took no time but called the hotel and they located my charger right away. I asked them to send the charger to my address in Jakarta, on my behalf. I desperately needed the charger because it's so hard to buy it in Jakarta. I would have to order online and usually took 3-4 days to arrive. The hotel staff arranged the package and they did not want me to pay. They said the hotel had already allocated the budget for this purpose. Two days after i called, i received the package safe and sound. 

Thank you Grand Zuri! You saved my life,, hahaha.. will definitely recommend the hotel and visit again! 

Cheers!
title: very helpful and kind staff with amazing service.

owner_response.text:
Hai Eflinasinulingga!

My warmest greetings to you and your family.

Ms. Eflinasinulingga, we hope to see you again during your next visit to Palembang.

text:
Number of Night : 1 Night
Room Type: Superior Double
Purpose: Business Meeting
Official Level : 4 Star

Lobby : 3 of 5 (just a simple lobby)
Check In Process : 3 of 5 (average processing time)
Room : 4 of 5 (well designed)
Toiletries : 2 of 5 ("free-flow" shampoo+conditioner+liquid soap, combined together in a dispenser)
Wifi in Room : 5 of 5 (fast)

What i like?
+ The breakfast is good in taste. Also providing Pempek, the fish cake.  The traditional food which is very well-known in Palembang.
+ Close to several restaurants nearby

What i don't like?
- No aircon in elevator. So hot.
- For a 4-star hotel, funny that they dont allow me to take the Key Card as souvenir, even though i have told the receptionist that i am a collector, and showed her the picture of my collections from many hotel brands.
- Concierge informed me that my rental car will be Toyota Innova, but the one showed up is Toyota Avanza.

Overall : 3 of 5 (recommendable, but i will try other hotel in my future visit)
title: Recommendable Hotel in Palembang

text:
Previously I stayed in Grand Zuri, Padang and satisfy. Therefore, I booked Grand Zuri, Palembang without hesitation and unconsciously set a high expectation. But unfortunately my expectation fall below.
+ they offer airport transfer and also car rental per hour with a very reasonable price
+ standard and clean room
+ friendly staffs
+ welcome drink always available next to reception but self service
+ we accept a welcome letter with free mocktail at lounge
+ very cozy and great lounge
+ good location, several restaurants within walking distance and also near Jembatan Ampera (Ampera Bridge) by car
+ Free wifi and good connection
+ fully equiped gym and semi indoor swimming pool

- we asked for a car rental, instead we got airport pick up only (I booked via phone and confirmed by the hotel). Our flight was delayed. Driver refuse to stop for a while in order for us to buy some food. But we didn't blame the driver as he received order for airport pick up only and still have other passenger to pick up. We were too tired to find out why there was a miscommunication. We just paid airport pick up fee during checked in.
- gym facilities are also open for non hotel guest. There is gym membership for public, so quite crowded.
- breakfast time was the biggest disappointment. Even though there weren't many guests during our breakfast time, but service was very poor. Many empty tables, but we couldn't found a clean table. So, we just choose the cleanest from all dirty table. We also found it very difficult to find a staff that we ended up to grab clean spoons and forks from other tables. I think all staff might be tired after watching the solar eclipse that morning. Various food but no local food at all (NB. Grand Zuri Padang served very delicious local food). No body at the noodle station. Took almost an hour before the empty porridge being filled. We saw 2-3 staffs when we almost finished our breakfast. Of course everything I mentioned about breakfast above unacceptable for a 4 star hotels for any reasons.
title: Good location but dissapointed breakfast

About Driver or Bell Man who ignore a good services to our respected guest as he had not given you very warm solution, in the future they will call Front Office Manager for any request from our guest.

text:
Stay at this hotel on March 2014, for business trip to Palembang.
I choose this hotel because its location in the central of the town.
Room OK, bed also comfort enough. With flat screen tv and international channels (as usual we find in good hotels). Air con works well. And I love the room because it's cleanliness and the placement for furniture also ok.
Bathroom ok and clean. 

The housekeeping always clean up the room everyday. And they always change the towels too, which is good point!

This hotel have swimming pool, I think not that big ya, but it's enough if you just need some refreshments. They also have gym centre on the same floor with the swimming pool (3rd floor). 
But at that time, I didn't try to swim or  to go to the gym.

I like the doorman, forgot to ask his name, but he's polite and friendly. 

Btw for the WiFi, it's ok! Many reviews complaint that the WiFi sucks, but its not right I think! Because for me, it works well, and enough to do my things. But the password always renew everyday, so you must ask the receptionist about the new password.

Location also good. There are two or three restaurants across the hotel, Kopitiam and Bakmie restaurant. I tried the bakmie restaurant, and taste ok and large portion. Price not that expensive.
Also there are mini mart near the hotels, and if you need some reflexy or massage, you can go to the place near hotel, around 5 minutes walking. 

Breakfast not that good! Tasteless and not that many varieties. I expected more than that!

Overall, it is good hotel for me. At least it can accommodate what I need. And if I back to Palembang, I still consider to stay at this hotel again.
title: Good hotel for business trip

text:
The hotel location is quite good, not far from the city center & Blue Bird taxi is quite easy to find. Only 10 minutes drive from Ampera Bridge which I think is the only sightseeing worth visiting in Palembang.

There's nothing to complain at all about the room, room size is decent, it's clean and well maintained. Bed is very comfy, AC is working perfectly, TV size & channel selection is good. Bathroom is also quite good, the shower is very strong and the temperature is good. 

Breakfast is good for a 3 star hotel. Quite a good selection of local food and some limited choice of western food such as salad, bread & cereals. Overall a good experience and so far one of the best value for money hotel in Palembang.

text:
We booked at the Grand Zuri for 2 non-smoking king rooms a week in advance.  We informed them about our expected arrival times (late in the evening) and reconfirmed the day of arrival in the morning.

Needless to say, upon arrival, our rooms had been given away to other guests, the only thing they had were in smoking floors; and they insisted that there were no other rooms available.

After much 'discussion' on, we were informed that indeed rooms were available (perhaps they had just built them during the the 'discussions') - and that we could have smaller rooms for cost of the king rooms.

More 'discussions' continued, and we were treated to a free night's stay (out of 4 nights) - but upon checking out we realized that they had lied about this and refused to refund our pre-paid reservation monies.

Overall, the hotel is done up nicely, the staff are pleasant (but incompetent); and room service fails in the most basic regard (we ran out of soap, the provided us 2 towels for 3 people), they would not provide more than 1 key-card; the internet was intermittent; and so was the power - 3 brown outs during our stay.

The word disappointing does not do this hotel justice.
title: Working hard to create inconveniences

text:
the hotel is basic and new. standard room with good tv channels, clean bathroom with basic amenities, not-so-tasty-but-quite-a-lot-varieties breakfast, speedy checkin and checkout, strategic location with some good restaurants beside the hotel serving chinese and traditional Palembang foods. the best yet disappointing is the wifi. i really love the idea of free wifi in the room but yet the signal is very poor, so it's kind of useless facilities.

airport transfer is quite expensive but there is nothing you can do since there is no official airport taxi. yet the blue bird in Palembang is not reliable. 

overall, i rated 3 1/2 stars for this hotel and will be back for sure.
title: basic and new

text:
This is my second time stayed in this hotel and found the hotel just new with very affordable room rate compare to the similar star in Palembang.

- Location is a bit further from activities and not so much taxi or public transport. As from frondesk for hotel taxi that you can charge into your room bill. Price is depending on distance, however you can also book from the driver and ask for his mobile number just in case you need pick up somehow. Or call Blue Bird taxi but tae time due to line was always busy

- Room and facilities are quite clean and good condition, as this hotel is just new (less then a year) with 42-ich flat screen with some cable channels and the best part is free wireless internet in the room.

- Small local chinese restaurant in front of the hotel and also local food beside the hotel. Both are affordable in price and fair in term of taste for local. You need a transport to go other resto such KFC, MCD or others.

- Room service and breakfast are good but no so much variety like international breakfast.
title: New Hotel Affordable Price

text: I read that this is a new joint in town and the front desk told me that it was only 8 months old. But don't let the new look makes you want to "upgrade" it to a 3*+ status. Checking in/out with no hassle. It's a minimalist hotel. I like the idea of not just going green, but actually doing it. Such as, they put a all-in-one liquid soap dispenser, instead of separated bottles of it. Tap card technology, instead of slot-inserted key cards. Room amenities were nice, but could be more to it. If only the desk chair had a cushion. Oh, well... The downside for me that the breakfast had little to choose from for a 3* hotel. I was expecting a bit more variety. But for lunch or dinner there are local culinary (also durian hawkers) to choose from, just outside the place. Free wifi was adequatly provided.
title: Brand new 3*

text:
Booking
Booking can be made easily via online travel agent or by calling directly the hotel. Unfortunately the hotel website does not allow for online booking at press time. I booked a superior twin room for my stay. 

Facilities
The hotel has several parking spots around the properties. More parking space is available across the road. Parking is free for hotel guests only. The hotel ground is always patrolled by security guard. The glass facade of the building gives it a clean and modern look. The lobby, despite smallish can do its job as a meeting place. To the left side of the lobby is where reception desk and lifts to guestrooms are located. To the right is Cerenti restaurant. There is a stair leading to the upper floor where one can find the bar (Zuri Lounge), business center, and few meeting rooms. Recreational facilities; from smallish indoor unheated swimming pool, fitness center, and a spa is located on 3rd floor. Guestrooms spread from level 3 to 9 (no level 4 in this building). 
This hotel is equipped with elevator-identification system. Guestrooms floor can only be accessed by scanning the room key into the slot in the elevator. 

Arrival
Doorman/bellboy only available at certain hours. By the time of my arrival (around 4pm), no one was manning the lobby, I could only saw a security guard and 2 front desk staff. Strangely, on other occasion I went to the lobby, there is doorman/bellboy standby at the lobby. 

Check-in
Check-in was smooth and fast. I was asked about my room preference (non-smoking) and quickly given the key to room 633. Breakfast voucher for 2 is also issued. 

The Room
I was disappointed to learn that my room does not have the view of Ampera bridge, the landmark of Palembang. However, I found the superior room is quite roomy to be occupied by 2 travelers. The room has earthy tone and wooden furniture (all in the same dark olive colour), very modern and cozy. The room has 2 single beds (it was twin room), a 32-inch LCD TV, minibar, lounge chair, and tea/coffee making facilities. My room has open-plan wardrobe with laundry bag, small electronic safe (not laptop-size), and clothes hangers brilliantly stored on each side of the wardrobe area with huge mirror in the center. 

The Bathroom
Bathroom has modern look with marble and concrete wall. The sink has soap dispenser by the side (see photo), two glasses, and toiletries. There is also a shower stall with other soap dispenser (this one contains 3-in-1 liquid soap). I am not a fan of soap dispensers and prefer the toiletries to be packed individually. 
Bathroom amenities including a shower cap, a comb, and 1 set of toothbrush and toothpaste (despite I was put in a twin room which supposed for double occupancy). For the hotel of this scale, I was expecting more amenities such as hair dryer, bathroom mat (there were only 2 towels and 2 hand towels), face towels, bathroom scale, and more toiletries (cotton buds, razor, etc). Pretty poor toiletries offering in all. 

Dining
Breakfast at Cerenti coffee shop has pretty extensive selection of local and international choices, the Zuri Lounge upstairs has small stage for in-house band, a bar, and couple of cozy sofas. One can enjoy internet access from this venue. The lounge has extensive menu, but alcoholic beverages are pretty expensive. 

Check-out
Check-out was swift and I was cleared in no time. 

Verdict
I would rate this hotel as 3-star deluxe as it has more features than a regular 3-star (keycard recognition security system, recreational and business facilities, etc. However, it's definitely not quite a 4-star for lack of some amenities. Staff are quite courteous and hospitable. This is a good choice to explore Palembang, despite not located nearby any of major tourist landmark.
title: Good Experience
